item.title: Bluescape Opportunities Acquisition Corp 10-K
item.description: Bluescape Opportunities Acquisition Corp, which is in the Blank Checks [6770] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 08, 2021 had 38019 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: business - 1061 instances combination - 784 instances shares - 774 instances initial - 661 instances may - 556 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
